TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DetailsViewDeleteEventArgs extends System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制引發事件時刪除 按鈕 (按鈕其`CommandName`屬性設定為"Delete") 控制項內按一下時前,控制項刪除資料錄。The control raises the event when a Delete button (a button with its `CommandName` property set to "Delete") within the control is clicked, but before the control deletes the record. 這可讓您提供執行自訂的常式，例如記錄刪除之前先驗證，此事件發生時的事件處理常式。This allows you to provide an event handler that performs a custom routine, such as verifying a record before deleting it, whenever this event occurs. A物件傳遞至事件處理常式，可讓您判斷要刪除記錄的索引，並指出應該取消刪除作業。A object is passed to the event handler, which allows you to determine the index of the record being deleted and to indicate that the delete operation should be canceled. 若要判斷記錄的索引，請使用屬性。To determine the index of a record, use the property. 若要取消刪除作業，請設定屬性`true`。To cancel the delete operation, set the property to `true`. 您也可以存取的索引鍵欄位和非索引鍵欄位，使用和屬性，分別。You can also access the key fields and non-key fields by using the and properties, respectively. 這些值會很有用，如果您想要確認記錄，然後再刪除它。These values are useful if you want to verify the record before deleting it. > [!NOTE] > 您可修改中的索引鍵欄位值屬性。It is possible to modify the key field values in the property. 如果您變更這些值，將會刪除對應至新的索引鍵欄位值的記錄。If you change these values, the record that corresponds to the new key field values will be deleted. 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). 如需執行個體的初始屬性值的清單類別，請參閱建構函式。For a list of initial property values for an instance of class, see the constructor. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用物件傳遞至事件處理常式取消刪除作業的事件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the object passed to the event handler for the event to cancel a delete operation. [!code-aspx-csharp[DetailsViewDeleteEventArgsCodeInline#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DetailsViewDeleteEventArgsCodeInline/CS/detailsviewdeleteeventargsinlinecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[DetailsViewDeleteEventArgsCodeInline#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DetailsViewDeleteEventArgsCodeInline/VB/detailsviewdeleteeventargsinlinevb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(int32 rowIndex) cil managed

param.name: rowIndex
param.span: 要刪除之資料列的索引。

span.span: The index of the row being deleted.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個建構函式初始化的新執行個體類別。Use this constructor to initialize a new instance of the class. 下表顯示的執行個體的初始屬性值類別。The following table shows the initial property value for an instance of the class. |屬性Property|初始值Initial Value| |--------------|-------------------| ||`rowIndex` 參數的值。The value of the `rowIndex` parameter.| > [!NOTE] > 引發事件時主要由控制項開發人員使用這個建構函式。This constructor is used primarily by control developers when raising events.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Keys As IOrderedDictionary

summary.span: 取得索引鍵欄位名稱/值組的排序字典，其中包含已刪除項目之索引鍵欄位的名稱和值。

span.span: Gets an ordered dictionary of key field name/value pairs that contains the names and values of the key fields of the deleted items.

value.span: ，包含用來比對要刪除項目之索引鍵欄位名稱/值組的排序字典。

span.span: An that contains an ordered dictionary of key field name/value pairs used to match the item to delete.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來存取索引鍵欄位或刪除資料錄欄位的值。Use the property to access the values of the key field or fields for the record to be deleted. 例如，您可以使用這些值來確認記錄，然後再刪除它，若要變更的記錄，若要刪除，或保存已刪除的記錄檔。For example, you can use these values to verify the record before deleting it, to change the record to delete, or to keep a log of deleted records. > [!NOTE] > 此屬性包含索引鍵的欄位。This property contains only the key fields. 若要存取非索引鍵欄位的名稱/值組值，請使用屬性。To access the name/value pair values for the non-key fields, use the property. 屬性會傳回該物件會實作介面。The property returns an object that implements the interface. 物件包含代表索引鍵欄位的物件。The object contains objects that represent the key fields. > [!NOTE] > 快速的方式，您也可以使用的索引子物件來存取的索引鍵欄位值。As a shortcut, you can also use the indexer of the object to access the key field values. 使用索引子的優點是，它會直接傳回索引鍵欄位值。The advantage in using the indexer is that it returns key field values directly. 這個屬性是唯讀的。不過，您可以修改的索引鍵欄位值它所傳回的物件。This property is read-only; however, you can modify the key field values of the object it returns. 如果您變更索引鍵欄位值，對應的記錄已刪除資料來源。If you change the key field values, the corresponding record is be deleted from the data source. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性來存取正在刪除記錄的索引鍵欄位的值。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to access the value of the key field for the record being deleted. [!code-aspx-csharp[DetailsViewDeleteEventArgsCodeInline#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DetailsViewDeleteEventArgsCodeInline/CS/detailsviewdeleteeventargsinlinecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[DetailsViewDeleteEventArgsCodeInline#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DetailsViewDeleteEventArgsCodeInline/VB/detailsviewdeleteeventargsinlinevb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property RowIndex As Integer
public: property int RowIndex { int get(); };

summary.span: 取得要刪除之資料列的索引。

span.span: Gets the index of the row being deleted.

value.span: 要刪除之資料列的索引。

span.span: The index of the row being deleted.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來判斷要刪除的資料列的索引。Use the property to determine the index of the row being deleted. 資料列索引通常用來擷取指定的資料列從集合控制項，可讓您存取資料列的屬性。The row index is often used to retrieve the specified row from the collection of the control, which allows you to access the row's properties. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性來判斷要刪除的資料列的索引。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to determine the index of the row being deleted. [!code-aspx-csharp[DetailsViewDeleteEventArgsCodeInline#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DetailsViewDeleteEventArgsCodeInline/CS/detailsviewdeleteeventargsinlinecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[DetailsViewDeleteEventArgsCodeInline#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DetailsViewDeleteEventArgsCodeInline/VB/detailsviewdeleteeventargsinlinevb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Values As IOrderedDictionary

summary.span: 取得要刪除項目中非索引鍵欄位名稱/值組的字典。

span.span: Gets a dictionary of the non-key field name/value pairs for the item to delete.

value.span: ，包含要刪除之項目中非索引鍵欄位名稱/值組的字典。

span.span: A that contains a dictionary of the non-key field name/value pairs for the item to delete.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來存取非索引鍵欄位，以刪除記錄的值。Use the property to access the values of the non-key fields for the record to be deleted. 例如，您可以使用這些值，若要確認記錄，然後再刪除它，或保存已刪除的記錄檔。For example, you can use these values to verify the record before deleting it, or to keep a log of deleted records. > [!NOTE] > 這個屬性不包含索引鍵欄位。This property does not contain the key field or fields. 若要存取的索引鍵欄位或欄位的名稱/值組值，請使用屬性。To access the name/value pair values for the key field or fields, use the property. 屬性會傳回該物件會實作介面。The property returns an object that implements the interface. 物件包含代表非索引鍵欄位的物件。The object contains objects that represent the non-key fields. > [!NOTE] > 快速的方式，您也可以使用的索引子物件來存取的欄位值。As a shortcut, you can also use the indexer of the object to access the field values. 使用索引子的優點是，它會直接傳回欄位值。The advantage in using the indexer is that it returns field values directly. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性來存取非索引鍵欄位，正在刪除之記錄的值。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to access the values of the non-key fields of the record being deleted. [!code-aspx-csharp[DetailsViewDeleteEventArgsCodeInline#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DetailsViewDeleteEventArgsCodeInline/CS/detailsviewdeleteeventargsinlinecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[DetailsViewDeleteEventArgsCodeInline#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DetailsViewDeleteEventArgsCodeInline/VB/detailsviewdeleteeventargsinlinevb.aspx#1)]
